branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Environment Options
branchCategory.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 12 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.  Environment options include the XC6 stainless steel piston rod, XC22 fluoro-rubber seals, XC35 coil scraper, and X130US stainless steel parts: piston rod, tie rod, tie rod nut, cushion valve needle. </p>

breadCrumb.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Environment Options
